text: NGC 429 is a lenticular galaxy of type S0^0: located in the constellation Cetus. It was discovered on December 20, 1786 by William Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "very faint, very small." ==References== ==External links== * 0429 17861220 Category:Cetus (constellation) Category:Lenticular galaxies
title: NGC 429
